no_javascript_text:
JAVASCRIPT FAILURE

This page is shown because the script on the previous page has failed to run.

This could be due to either a failure in the script, or your browser has javascript disabled.
welcome_text:
SKIPOLE +-->

Well done!
This is the home page of your new project with template page ident 2001.

The template page 2001 is held in a 'restricted' folder, and to access it the client browser calls /index which leads to a 'NoOperation' Responder, which in turn passes the call to this template page.  This is done so you can delete the Responder and set another, such as a 'SubmitData' Responder which will call your submit_data function if you wish to dynamically insert data into this template.

This page has been set with an "error_messages.ErrorPara" widget as its 'default error widget' - normally hidden, but will be displayed if an error condition is raised leading to this page.

This text is set in a TextBlock with reference 'welcome_text' - your next step is to call /skiadmin and edit the body of page 2001 to remove the TextBlock and add your own content.
